website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced batting tee that comes with some user-friendly features as well as the possibility for a few quality and durability issues.
pros: Easily adjusts up to 40-inches in height, and reduces to a compact size for transport
Made for players ages seven and older
Base is constructed of steel to keep it from tipping
cons: Some concerns of longevity, as components have been reported to break with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying a Wal-Mart variant that had a plastic connector with screws. The Wal-Mart version lasted about 1 swing from a kid and snapped. I ordered this to replace it. It is exactly like the ones I used as a kid. No tools needed and extremely sturdy. My kids miss the ball and smack the rubberized tube all the time and nothing has happened to it. Worth the money. It is an investment and I would not hesitate bringing this to every tee ball practice for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bluewidow862

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this tee on Feb 25, and received it shortly thereafter. It's been perfect for our 4.5 yr old to practice batting, as the height is adjustable and the base is stable so it doesn't topple over. The main problem is that the rubber is already cracking at the seams. Since this isn't undergoing heavy duty use, it's really disappointing that it's already falling apart in less than a month of use. I suppose we'll have to super glue it to keep it from cracking all the way down, but I would expect having to do that after extended use, not only a few weeks of use by a preschooler with a plastic bat.
customer_reviews.author: Super Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After about one hundred balls hit from a five year old, the Tee snapped off the base. After closer inspection, the Tee is only tack welded in four small areas at the base mount. Since the plate base is weighted, this allows the minuscule connections to vibrate and break. Not sure what the warranty is, I certainly don't want to pay shipping back for a replacement. I am thinking maybe I can beef of the support and weld a better bracket on.
customer_reviews.author: Cristinota

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could tell you how well the tee works, but it was broken when it arrived. Screw part was broken off which is apparently an issue other people are having. To say I have a disappointed 5 yr old is an understatement. I haven’t decided if I’m going to get another tee from a different company, or if I will give this company another shot.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The tee is nice and extends up for a 5'9" adult but after 150 hits, the rubber extension that holds the ball split on 2 sides. I don't hit the rubber often, either. Otherwise its a decent item. I'll be using duct tape to make it last awhile longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bo

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF FUMES
customer_reviews.text: Great product and well made. HOWEVER THE FUMES ARE BEYOND COMPREHENSION!! We had to leave it outside and take out of home or garage. Even if we left in car it affected everyone. Like sniffing paint thinner. Product stays outside. We still use it but when we travel with it in car we have to roll down Windows. Crazy
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Top of tee snapped off
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the good reviews. Used maybe 4-5 times with my 8 year old son. Last time he used it, the rubber top of the tee where the ball goes snapped off. And my son isn't one to hit the tee at all. Unsure if it was defective or something else. Disappointed as this should be a tee that lasts for years. I will be trying to contact the seller to try and get a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Chrisjohn

customer_reviews.text: I have to give this a three. I bought two of them for tee stations in my indoor hitting facility. One of them works great, the other broke off at the base the very first time it was hit. The Spot weld on the washer/ nut/bolt did not hold at all. My buddy is going to weld it back on.....I hope it doesn't melt to bad?
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast compared to our old one. Very heavy duty, most likely can't be destroyed by our 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, won'tbreak on you, just what you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very durable heavy-duty construction tee! This is my second one I accidentally left the first one at the fields after a tournament. I'm merely went right back to this model.
customer_reviews.author: ArgentX

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poor quality Tee
customer_reviews.text: This unit is just crap. The rubber and the bottom mount is made of low quality material. The bottom screw unit already broke in less than 12 months of use. I wouldn't recommend this for kids who play baseball as a serious sport. This is a product for just hitting occasionally, not meant for long term use. But I would have liked for it to have lasted at least 24 months. Don't buy this poor quality tee.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Basic and fine. Smells awful out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: It's weighted well. Plate is a bit warped. Rubber smells awful. Like it needs aired out for a week or longer.
customer_reviews.author: MaciLou

customer_reviews.title: Great for t-ball!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for teaching your kid to bat--or for t-ball practice! It's fairly inexpensive and high quality. We're glad to have our own and our kid has practice plenty with it. Great buy! It does stink a little (like plastic), but that goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Miller

customer_reviews.title: Maybe better for a smaller child of two
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandson killed it in one week .the weld at the bottom gave out
customer_reviews.author: pointegraphics

customer_reviews.title: Quality training aid
customer_reviews.text: Just like your tee ball days. It just absorbs abuse at batting practice, then gets tossed into the bed of my truck getting more abuse until I use it again. Short enough and sturdy enough for my tee-baller who hits the tee more than the ball. Extends tall enough for me to practice with. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, my grandson loves it. Appears to be durable and should hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: A great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product so far for the price. Sturdy base and construction, yet flexible enough to be safe. The height adjustment is easy enough for my 3 year old to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 20 swings from a 4 year old. AVOID PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Less than 20 swings in on this thing from my 4 year old and the Tee is split almost 6 inches. Horrible product do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wells

customer_reviews.title: A Good Tee Stand
customer_reviews.text: This item is sturdy and durable, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: I have four kids hitting off of this.
customer_reviews.text: Starting to tear at the top. But what do you expect it's a rubber hitting tee.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 4-year old son. In a short while the tee broke off completely. I have duct taped it many times just to make it useable. The rubber base has a Chevrolet logo for some very odd reason. Maybe recycled rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: This is junk.  It broke on the first day.
customer_reviews.text: The tee broke off the from the base on the first day! I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Thing lasted a week the top got destroyed and my kid rarely misses the ball and hits the rubber. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 year old and my 14year old.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I’ve made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Batting tee broke after 10 minutes of use by a 10yr old using a wiggle ball bat. The metal piece where it’s attached was poorly welded in 3 spots and broke off. Very disappointing and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Watson

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a month. The return window just closed on me or I would send it back. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Paschal

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get to use it. It snapped at the base. Cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My son used it for a couple days and the rubber at top split and broke. I had to cut it so he could still use it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BlankHat

customer_reviews.title: Bad connections, quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke, poorly made, tack welds grossly insufficient. I’m asking my money back, we’ll see if I get the funds back. Threw this item in the garbage we were so let down, considering my son just started learning baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Jf

customer_reviews.title: It’s an awful design
customer_reviews.text: We got this delivered and immediately opened it and set it up for the kids. They had it for 3 minutes and it’s broken. The welding that they use to hold the tube and the plate together is 4 spots of a tack weld. A toddler could break this. I am more than disappointed in this equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Not strong and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: The base broke easily. Not worth for the price. Won’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids, athletes, adults, drunks
customer_reviews.text: My upcoming softball prodigy niece is going to hit it out of the park with this new product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for two months.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost a couple months and used it for my kid to practice at home between games before it broke. The tack welds broke holding it to the bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I got the batting tee, and I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, it will help my daughters bat much better. these people got it to me pretty fast. I am giving a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: It gets wobbly at times bit overall it is perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: End of the tee broke within a week of 9 year old using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R

customer_reviews.title: Broke first swing
customer_reviews.text: Broke first swing, barely brushes the top. Attachment bolt/washer held on with 4 tiny tack welds. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David harvey

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 3 uses, maybe 50 swings. Aren't tees supposed be able to take a little abuse before they break where you place the ball? Don't waste your money on this. I will be contacting the company to see if they will replace the product or offer a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great T-ball hitting tee
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, adjust the height and let the boy hit away. Nice sturdy product would really recommend. Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the cheaper plastic models from toy stores
customer_reviews.text: It's adjustable for my two year old to use. Much better than the cheaper plastic models from toy stores. Very happy to be raising the next all star
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Problems to fix on your product
customer_reviews.text: Quality on the ball holder is not that good and resistant the rest is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. It almost looked like it was used because it was dirty and had hand prints all over it. They the upper part of the tee wouldn't stay up and we had to add table to make it stay at the right height. Then after less than 10 minutes of use it broke.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The tee cracked after 50 swings. Very cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It broke after a couple hits. Not very good construction. Didn't feel it was misused. Would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I went through two of these and they both broke at the top of the tee.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Tee up for my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: When I received the tee for my Grandson, the top of the tee was split about two inches. We both wanted to play baseball and this was the first time for my Grandson. Instead of going through the hassle of returning, I taped the crack with electrical tape. All is good until my Grandson (age 4 } hit the ball and the top split further down and fell off the tee. I want another tee for my Grandson that is not split at all. Sincerely, Nancy Deakin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS!
customer_reviews.text: VERY unhappy with the way the T didn't hold up for 1 season of T ball! Broke off at the top!
customer_reviews.author: MJV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are using this to practice t-ball for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: kwalko

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heavy duty tee for younger players.
customer_reviews.author: w

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Batting Tee - MLB Industrial Grade Batting Tee - Heavy Duty Baseball and Softball Hitting Tee - Great for Teeball - Adjustable Height, Black
product_meta.description: The Franklin Sports MLB Industrial Batting Tee is built for durable performance no matter how many cuts it takes to perfect your swing. The heavy-duty industrial strength rubber is designed to absorb any impact, while the weighted steel plate supplies a strong, stable base that will remain upright. Plus, the all-weather rubber ensures that the tee will be ready for use season after season without succumbing to the elements. The tee adjusts from 20" to 40" so hitters of all sizes can practice hitting pitches up or down in the zone to help them become well-rounded hitters. So whether you're playing tee ball, softball, or baseball this tee is the perfect training tool for players of all ages to practice and perfect their swing!
feature_bullets: Batting tee for T-ball, softball, baseball. Manufacturer's suggested age: 7+
Features weighted steel for added stability
No hardware assembly. Simply screw post to base
